alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 12:49AM CST until December 20 at 4:35AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Illinois River near Tahlequah affecting Cherokee County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River near Tahlequah. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, moderate flooding occurs from Hanging Rock downstream towards Tahlequah. Access roads east of the Combs Bridge near Eagles Bluff will be impassable. Extreme turbulence makes the river too hazardous for floating. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 AM CST Saturday the stage was 6.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 13.9 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
